attributes.action: Stop commercial development of land proposed in balloch wdc
attributes.background: The powers at be want to development the land area from balloch bridge to the maid of the loch into a holiday resort like flamingo land. This area is well known tourist attraction and local businesses survive on this. We don't have the roads nor hospital cover to support this. And would ruin balloch

rejection.details: You may be able to start a petition to the Scottish Parliament about this. You can contact the clerks of the Public Petitions Committee for advice about this by emailing petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
